QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read a list of specific elements or parts of the 2010 health care law. For each, please tell me whether you think it is something the law does, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the 2010 health care law does or does not...allow undocumented immigrants to receive financial help from the government to buy health insurance?
SubPopulation: Asked of Form B half sample
StudyNote: 421 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 785 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 465 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
